articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Malaysian Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Malaysian Political Party Leader
						
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from  Datuk Seri Tengku Adnan Tengku Mansor, secretary general of the United Malays National Organization of Malaysia, on Feb. 4.
					 The message paid highest tribute to leader Kim Jong Il on behalf of the Supreme Council of the United Malays National Organization of Malaysia and all its members on the occasion of his 71st birth anniversary.
					
					 It wished Kim Jong Un good health and greater success in his responsible work for leading the country, expressing hope that the relations between the two parties would grow stronger.

articles.title: Foreign Players Fly Back
articles.content:
Foreign Players Fly Back
						
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Players of Russia, Ukraine, Estonia and Canada flew back home on Tuesday after participating in the 22nd Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival.

articles.title: East Timor President on Boosting Economic Cooperation with DPRK
articles.content:
East Timor President on Boosting Economic Cooperation with DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Taur Matan Ruak, president of East Timor, expressed hope that the friendly and cooperative relations between East Timor and the DPRK would grow strong in all fields.
					 He said this when receiving credentials from Ri Jong Ryul, DPRK ambassador to East Timor, on Feb. 11.
					
					 The two countries have potentials to cooperate with each other in various domains, the president said, stressing East Timor will actively promote economic cooperation with the DPRK which has a wealth of experience.

articles.title: Cuban Ambassador to DPRK Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Cuban Ambassador to DPRK Hosts Reception
						
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- German Hermin Ferras Alvarez, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception at his embassy Tuesday in celebration of the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Yong Il, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister, and officials concerned.
					
					 The ambassador said at the reception that the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il was an immortal life dedicated to increasing the national power of the DPRK, building socialism and improving the people's living standard.
					
					 He noted that Cuba would as ever stand by the fraternal Korean people in the struggle for sovereignty, socialist construction and national reunification.
					
					 He on behalf of the Cuban party, government and people sincerely wished the dear respected Kim Jong Un good health and greater success in his work for the happiness and prosperity of the Korean people 
					
					 Kim Yong Il noted that the Cuban comrades significantly celebrate the Day of the Shining Star every year, adding that it is an expression of their reverence for Kim Jong Il.
					
					 His undying revolutionary career and feats are shining thanks to Kim Jong Un, he noted.
					
					 The DPRK will steadily strengthen and develop the ties of friendship and cooperation with Cuba and extend full support and solidarity to the just struggle of the Cuban people, he stressed.

articles.title: Army-people Rallies Held to Hail Underground Nuclear Test
articles.content:
Army-people Rallies Held to Hail Underground Nuclear Test
						
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Army-people rallies took place in South Phyongan, South Hwanghae and Ryanggang provinces and Nampho City on Tuesday to hail the third underground nuclear test.
					 Present at the rallies were leading officials of the party and power organs and working people's organizations, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials of factories, enterprises, co-operative farms, universities and colleges and other people, teachers and students in the provinces.
					
					 Speakers said that the DPRK's third underground nuclear test that startled the world was a special event which fully demonstrated that the DPRK does what it is determined to do no matter what storm and stress it may encounter.
					
					 The successful nuclear test, which clearly showed that the will of Songun Korea for defending its sovereignty, is a shining fruition  of matchless grit, pluck and wise leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, they noted, adding:.
					
					 Neither "sanctions" racket nor military superiority of the arrogant enemies can provoke the great Paektusan nation even a bit. Gone are the days never to return when enemies could threaten and blackmail the DPRK with A-bombs.
					
					 They warmly congratulated scientists, technicians, workers and officials on achieving a spectacular success in their nuclear test and thereby fully demonstrating the independent dignity and invincible spirit of the great Paektusan nation.
					
					 Through the recent special event all the service personnel and people have come to cherish the belief that a final victory is sure to come when they dynamically advance along the road of independence, Songun and socialism, following the great Workers' Party of Korea, the speakers stressed.

articles.title: Art Exhibition Features Kim Jong Il's Undying Feats
articles.content:
Art Exhibition Features Kim Jong Il's Undying Feats
						
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- A national art exhibition is going on at the Korean Art Gallery from Feb. 14 to mark the Day of the Shining Star (Feb. 16), the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 On display there are 70 fine art pieces, including Korean, oil and acryl paintings presented by the Mansudae Art Studio, Central Fine Arts Studio, Pyongyang University of Fine Arts and other institutions.
					
					 Oil paintings "I Came to See My Soldiers", "On Snow-covered Post" "Persimmon Season" lively represent the harmonious whole between Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il and servicepersons.
					
					 Korean paintings "General Kim Jong Il among Workers of Songjin Steel Complex" and "Kim Jong Il among Coal Miners" deal with Kim Jong Il's tireless efforts made to encourage the workers in bringing a production upsurge.
					
					 Korean painting "Kim Jong Il among Makers of Ryonha CNC Machines" gives a glimpse of his energetic guidance for the development of CNC-based machines.
					
					 Oil painting "Unfolding Grand Blueprint for Nature-remaking Projects" and acryl painting "Panmunjom at Dawn" show the devoted service Kim Jong Il made to spruce up the socialist country and realize the cause of national reunification.
					
					 Posters "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Jong Il Will Always Be with Us" and "Let Us Build Thriving Nation Our Own Way!" mirror the steadfast will of the local people to hold him in high esteem for all ages and their resolve to surely build a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The art exhibition will run until Feb. 28.

articles.title: DPRK Service Personnel Vow to Give U.S. Imperialists Finishing Stroke
articles.content:
DPRK Service Personnel Vow to Give U.S. Imperialists Finishing Stroke
						
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Upon hearing the news of the successful third underground nuclear test, soldiers of the Korean People's Army at the post on Mt. Taedok renewed their will to mercilessly wipe out those who dare provoke the DPRK. 
					 Officer Han Jin Hyok said he was very pleased to hear the news, adding:
					
					 The DPRK demonstrated once again the grit and pluck of Songun Korea which does what it is determined to do and the iron faith and will of the great Paektusan nation, which never makes an empty talk.
					
					 I feel highly proud of being soldiers of the peerlessly brilliant commander.
					
					 Soldiers on the forefront extend the warmest salute to the scientists, technicians, workers and officials who succeeded in the underground nuclear test. 
					
					 Officer Pae Chung Hyok said that the recent underground nuclear test was a resolute and just step for self-defence taken by the DPRK against the vicious moves of the U.S., the sworn enemy of the Korean people.
					
					 He went on: The nuclear test is part of the practical counter actions to defend the security and sovereignty of the country. The nuclear test, a striking physical demonstration of the high performance of the DPRK's nuclear deterrent, was another proud victory of Songun Korea as it clearly manifested the will of the powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu to wipe out the enemies.
					
					 Non-commissioned officer Ri Il Gwon said:
					
					  It is the spirit of the powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu to strike enemies once it is determined to do and emerge a victor in any battle.
					
					 We warn the brigandish U.S. imperialists. They should bear in mind that they can never escape a deadly strike, should they infringe upon the sovereignty of the DPRK even a bit.
					
					 Soldier Ri Jong Hak said:
					
					 Let us blow up such land as the U.S., cesspool of injustice and malignant tumor-like entity on the earth. These are angry voices of the service personnel of the KPA heard from its every post.
					
					 We firmly pledge ourselves not to miss the golden chance of wiping out the aggressors through merciless crushing blows but achieve the historic cause of the country's reunification without fail, if the enemies infringe upon the sovereignty of the DPRK even a bit.

articles.title: DPRK Draws Increasing Number of Tourists
articles.content:
DPRK Draws Increasing Number of Tourists
						
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Interest in DPRK tourism is ever growing worldwide. 
					 According to data available, a large number of people visited the DPRK for tourism from some 50 countries and regions over the last one year.
					
					 The number of tourists has been steadily increased from the beginning of the 2000s, sharply from Juche 98 (2009). 
					
					 The number of arrivals from European countries is also on increase.
					
					 The increase is fueled by many attractions.  
					
					 Eye-catching achievements made by the country in the effort for building a thriving socialist nation in recent years are one of the attractions.
					
					 Some of the tourists introduce their good impressions of the country through media and websites.
					
					 New air routes by chartered flights to the DPRK were opened last year from Shanghai, Harbin, Xian and Yanji of China.
					
					 The Kuala Lumpur-Pyongyang air route was re-opened as a regular service in tourism season.
					
					 Local tourism by plane and bicycle is encouraged and border areas were opened for tourism.
					
					 Among tourism destinations are Mts. Paektu, Kumgang and Chilbo, Sinuiju City in North Phyongan Province and the Rason Economic and Trade Zone.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed 
						
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday dedicates an article to the 39th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Some Immediate Tasks of Party Ideological Work for Modeling the Whole Society on Kimilsungism".
					  The work, published on Feb. 19, Juche 63 (1974), formulates the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as Kimilsungism, comprehensively clarifies its historical position, constituent system and contents and declares it as the supreme programme of the Workers' Party of Korea to model the whole society on Kimilsungism.
					
					 The work serves as an important one of great significance in the WPK and the revolutionary history, the article says, dealing with the feats Kim Jong Il performed in the course of modeling the whole society on the Juche idea.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 He long ago analyzed and reviewed the history of the previous working-class revolutionary idea with his rare ideological and theoretical wisdom and provided ever-victorious guidelines for the Korean revolution.
					
					 Thanks to his leadership, the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung was systematized in an integral manner and glorified as an encyclopedic revolutionary doctrine which clarifies a correct outlook on the world, revolutionary theory and fighting method in the era of independence.
					
					 The single-minded unity is the mainstay for the Korean revolution and the most important national defence capability stronger than a nuclear weapon. This was his political creed.
					
					 Under his leadership, the work to establish the party's monolithic ideological system gained in depth and the tradition of unity provided in Mt. Paektu is being successfully carried forward.
					
					 The principle of independence and Juche is the revolutionary principle he consistently adhered to in the whole course of leading the revolution and construction.
					
					 He led the army and the people of the DPRK to victory under the uplifted banner of Juche and patriotism all his life, the article concludes.

articles.title: Bolstering Nuclear Deterrence Is DPRK's Option for Defending Dignity and Security of Nation
articles.content:
Bolstering Nuclear Deterrence Is DPRK's Option for Defending Dignity and Security of Nation 
						
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's third underground nuclear test was a strong measure for self-defence to cope with the U.S. and its allies' shameless provocation against the DPRK, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a bylined article.
					 The army and people of the DPRK declared an all-out action to foil the gangster-like hostile acts of the U.S. and its allies. This is a just action to defend the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. put the DPRK in the list of "preemptive nuclear attack" in the past and has posed constant nuclear threats to the DPRK.
					
					 It is clear that the Korean Peninsula will never be rid of military confrontation and the danger of a nuclear war as long as the U.S. does not opt for the fundamental repeal of its vicious hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 But for the DPRK's powerful war deterrence for self-defence built by dint of Songun, a war might have broken out on the Korean Peninsula more than once.
					
					 To cope with the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces' increasing threat of a nuclear war, the DPRK has closely followed their moves with the highest vigilance. The DPRK has kept itself fully ready to defend the dignity, sovereignty and the supreme interests of the country and the nation.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists and the puppet warmongers make even the slightest provocation encroaching upon the sovereignty of the DPRK while calling for "tightening sanctions", its revolutionary armed forces which have grown stronger with the might of Songun will deal merciless and prompt annihilating blows to the aggressors by mobilizing all the offensive and defensive means including a nuclear deterrence.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Remarks for "Change of Social System" Blasted: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Remarks for "Change of Social System" Blasted: Rodong Sinmun 
						
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak made sophism that "it is necessary to draw up a package strategy for leading the north to change", while clamoring that "the north can never be made to abandon its nuclear program by negotiations and dialogue". 
					 His remarks made on February 15 clearly proves his sordid nature as a rare confrontation maniac who is always obsessed with the ambition for doing harm to the DPRK, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a bylined commentary.
					
					 What the traitor uttered is nothing but nonsense of a sleep-walker who has not yet been awakened from a pipe dream of "unification of social systems", the news analyst says, and goes on:
					
					 The recent nuclear test carried out by the DPRK powerfully demonstrated the indomitable spirit of the DPRK which is invariably advancing along the path of Songun, the path of Juche chosen by it despite any pressure and threats from the enemies. The nuclear test also displayed the tremendous might of the DPRK.
					
					 Hostile forces now assert that dialogue and negotiations can be the way of solving the problem, saying that "sanctions" and military pressure offensive will be useless. The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors has been upset by the development.
					
					 The traitor seeks to deter the situation on the Korean Peninsula from being eased, escalate the atmosphere of bitterness toward the DPRK at any cost and, at the same time, push forward its traitorous plan for "unification of social systems" while citing the DPRK's measure for bolstering nuclear deterrence as a pretext.
					
					 But the puppet forces' sordid plan will never be realized as in the past.
					
					 Traitor Lee had better stop the useless farce but get himself ready to go to his own grave.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts Japan for Planning to Reexamine "Kono Statement"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts Japan for Planning to Reexamine "Kono Statement"
						
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The chief Cabinet secretary of Japan in a recent official appearance openly disclosed an intention to reexamine the "Kono statement" in which Japan admitted the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 An adviser to Abe for diplomatic policy made such nonsense that the "Kono statement" was a diplomatic gaffe of Japan in the past. He even said that internationalizing the sexual slavery issue will make Japan, a defeated nation, stand isolated and it is necessary to make it clear that there has not existed the sexual slavery issue when giving education to locals. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a bylined article brands his remarks as an intolerable insult to justice and human ethics, and an act of going against history that is aimed to ignore the war crimes.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' acts of denying blood-stained war crimes committed by the previous generation are an act aimed to revive militarism and make the past history of aggression repeat itself, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The majority of those holding important posts of the present government in Japan are steeped in revanchist and militaristic idea for aggression. They are preoccupied with the idea of how to realize the dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere" which Japan failed to put into a reality in the past.
					
					 The new Cabinet of Japan with ultra-right tendency plans to reorganize the "Self-Defence Forces" into "national defence forces" and retrogressively revise the present constitution to provide legislation for exercising the right to collective self-defence, while loudly calling for beefing up the defence capabilities.
					
					 Japan is whetting a sword to avenge its defeat in the war, far from feeling responsibility for the past crimes of aggression. "Peace" shouted by Japan is just a call for reinvasion and a war ballad.
					
					 The revival of militarism will never lead Japan to a "normal state" as often claimed by Abe. It will, instead, lead Japan to destruction.
					
					 Those who run headlong into a war while denying history will never be able to evade punishment and destruction, warns the article.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Warmongers to Stage North-targeted War Maneuvers
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Warmongers to Stage North-targeted War Maneuvers
						
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Naval forces of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and the south Korean puppet army are planning to stage large-scale anti-submarine exercises in the East Sea of Korea from Feb. 19 to 24, south Korean Yonhap News reported.
					 It was reported that the north-targeted joint military exercises will be staged under the pretext of coping with someone's "submarine provocation" with more than 10 warships including Aegis destroyer, sea-patrol planes and other huge armed forces involved.
					
					 The warmongers claimed that the exercises would help strengthen the "alliance" with the U.S. and "reinforce the posture of strongly reacting to the north's threat" on its basis.  
					
					 Their ceaseless north-targeted saber-rattling is pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful Nuclear Test Hailed by Koreans in Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful Nuclear Test Hailed by Koreans in Kyrgyzstan
						
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan issued a statement on Feb. 14 hailing the DPRK's successful third underground nuclear test.
					 It was a very just countermeasure for self-defence taken by the DPRK, a sovereign state, to cope with the U.S. and its allies' moves to isolate and stifle it, the statement said.
					
					 It also fully demonstrated the tremendous national power of Songun Korea and the indomitable will of the Korean people to settle accounts with the U.S. with arms to the end, the statement noted, urging the U.S. and its allies to stop acting rashly, clearly seeing  the pent-up grievance and resentment of the Korean people.
					
					 The confederation expresses full support and solidarity for the people in the homeland in their just struggle to defend the sovereignty and peace of the country despite the moves of the U.S. imperialists to stifle the DPRK, the statement stressed.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Celebrated by Koreans in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Celebrated by Koreans in Russia
						
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Russia held a meeting on Feb. 14 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 The participants laid bouquets before his portrait.
					
					 Chairman of the confederation Kim Chil Song, addressing the meeting, said that the greatest immortal feat Kim Jong Il performed for the country and nation was that he defended the sovereignty of the nation from the moves of the imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK and turned it into a space power and nuclear weapons state.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 His far-sightedness and policy of attaching importance to science resulted in the successful nuclear test in the DPRK, the speakers noted, declaring that the Koreans in Russia would make tangible contributions to achieving the reunification of the country and the nation's prosperity, proud of being members of the Korean nation which successfully conducted the nuclear test in the wake of launching satellite by its own efforts and with indigenous technology.
					
					 Korean film "Arms of Korea" was shown.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Celebrated by Koreans in Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Celebrated by Koreans in Kyrgyzstan
						
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan held an event at the Korean Center in Bishkek on Feb. 15 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the portraits of great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il at an office of the confederation before paying tribute to them.
					
					 Chairman of the confederation Pak Kyong Ho made a speech.
					
					 He said he recollected with deep emotion the shining revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il, who performed the undying feats for the country and its people, on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.
					
					 The Kumsusan Palace of the Sun where he lies in state was remodeled in the most sublime manner as the sacred temple of Juche, Pak noted, adding:
					
					 His cause is being successfully carried forward generation after generation by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un. The DPRK will be built into a thriving country and Korea will certainly be reunified thanks to his wise leadership.
					
					 The confederation and compatriots will make positive contributions to opening up an epochal phase of national reunification this year.
					
					 The participants watched a Korean film showing the revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il giving field guidance to the work in different domains of the national economy.
					
					 A performance was given by Korean artistes on the same day to celebrate the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked in Benin
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked in Benin
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- A national seminar was held in the Cotonou Institute of Journalism of Benin on Feb. 5 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 Present there were personages of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Cotonou Institute of Journalism and Abomey-Calavi University in Benin and masses.
					
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, made a report titled "Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is an integral system of idea, theory and method of Juche".
					
					 He said:
					
					 The Juche idea is an important part of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and serves as its quintessence.
					
					 The Juche idea which says that man is the master of his own destiny and is capable of carving out his own destiny clarifies man-centered philosophical principle, the socio-historical principles and the guiding principles for the revolution and construction.
					
					 Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism raised the issue of leadership method as an independent part of the revolutionary idea for the first time in history and comprehensively systemized it.
					
					 The undying feats the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un performed by formulating the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism will shine forever.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Commemorated Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Commemorated Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 They included a lecture in Russia, a joint seminar, book and photo exhibition and film show in the U.K. and round-table talks in Austria, Democratic Congo and Malaysia between Feb. 7 and 9.
					
					 On display in the venues were photos of Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Books, including works of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un, and photos showing the efforts of the Korean people for building a thriving nation were also exhibited.
					
					 The chairman of the Karelia-DPRK Friendship Association of Russia praised Kim Jong Il as the great leader who devoted his all to the prosperity of the DPRK and its people's happiness.
					
					 He developed the Workers' Party of Korea into an ever-victorious guiding force, the DPRK into an impregnable socialist state and strengthened the Korean People's Army into an invincible army, the chairman added.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain, the chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and other speakers lauded the feats Kim Jong Il performed for freedom and emancipation of people, reunification and prosperity of the country and global independence.
					
					 They voiced strong opposition to the imperialists' all sorts of defamation and sanctions against the DPRK and positive support to the DPRK's the space development for peaceful purposes, its independent right.
					
					 The executive secretary of a district committee in Kinshasa City of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democracy of Democratic Congo said Kim Jong Il, an outstanding thinker and theoretician, developed the DPRK into an politico-ideological power and military power by successfully embodying the Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at an event held in Britain.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Brazilian Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Brazilian Figure
						
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the Brazilian Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il issued a statement under the title "Great Comrade Kim Jong Il, guide of cause of independence" on Feb. 5 on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 The human cause of independence has steadfastly advanced despite a stern trial of history and this would be unthinkable without Kim Jong Il, leader of the DPRK, the statement said, adding:
					
					 It was an event to be specially recorded in the history of accomplishing the human cause of independence that he formulated President Kim Il Sung's revolutionary idea as an integral system of idea, theory and method of Juche.
					
					 He authored lots of works including "On the Juche Idea," developing in depth, reviewing and systematizing the Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The Juche idea was rapidly disseminated abroad and officially recognized as an idea guiding the cause of independence. The world progressives came to have a powerful ideological and theoretical weapon for building a world free from all sorts of exploitation, binding, domination and subjugation.
					
					 He established a perfect theory of socialism.
					
					 He authored a series of immortal works, proving the validity and truth of the socialist idea and its inevitable victory and comprehensively clarifying theoretical and practical issues in accomplishing the human cause of independence late in the  20th century when the imperialists noisily trumpeted about "the final end of socialism" with its collapse in various countries as an occasion.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Observed in Guinea, Cambodia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Observed in Guinea, Cambodia
						
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Bulletins were issued in Guinea and Cambodia on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 The Guinean preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Shining Star and the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea jointly issued a special bulletin with various articles on Feb. 9.
					
					 An article titled "Tender-hearted father of people" said the Korean people and the world progressives remember him in the humblest reverence for him on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.
					
					 HeKim Jong Il pursued the politics of love for the people in name and reality, said the article, adding:
					
					 He spared nothing for the people, finding his joy in their happiness.
					
					 He made ceaseless journeys for field guidance to mix with people.
					
					 In an article titled "Kimjongilia" the bulletin introduced in detail the festival of the immortal flower, an annual event in the DPRK.
					
					 The News Agency AKP of Cambodia carried in its bulletin on Feb. 11 an article titled "Kim Jong Il revered by people", which praised the undying Songun revolutionary leadership feats he performed by realizing the long-cherished desire of the Korean people to lead a dignified life in a powerful independent country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Foreign Organizations 
						
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Foreign organizations posted special write-ups on their websites on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its website an article titled "Kim Jong Il, leader of people" on Feb. 7 illustrated with the portrait of the smiling leader.
					
					 Love for the people constitutes the core of his personality, said the article, adding:
					
					 He loved the people so much that he pursued an unprecedented benevolent politics.
					
					 It was his outlook on life to serve the people and dedicate himself to them.
					
					 How ardently he loved the people can be explained by the fact that he made ceaseless journeys for field guidance, said the article, referring in detail to his forced march for field guidance. 
					
					 The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted the following article on its website on Feb. 8:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was an outstanding thinker and theoretician who provided an ideological and theoretical foundation for the Korean revolution and the world revolution by developing and enriching the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung, and an ever-victorious brilliant Songun commander who defended socialism with his unique Songun politics, meeting the challenges of the imperialist allied forces. 
					
					 The exploits he performed by developing the Workers' Party of Korea into a force leading the socialist revolution and construction to victory and the Korean People's Army into invincible revolutionary armed forces will last forever along with the human  history. 
					
					 The Swiss preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Shining Star on Feb. 3 posted on its website an article titled "DPRK has emerged space power thanks to Comrade Kim Jong Il's patriotic devotion".

articles.title: Ecuadorian Organizations Hail DPRK's Successful Underground Nuclear Test
articles.content:
Ecuadorian Organizations Hail DPRK's Successful Underground Nuclear Test
						
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Ecuadorian organizations made public a joint statement on Feb. 13 to hail the DPRK's successful third underground nuclear test. They included the Cultural Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Committee for Supporting Korea's Independent and Peaceful Reunification, the Canar Provincial Institute for the Friendship and Solidarity with DPRK, the Guaranda Institute for Friendship and Cultural Solidarity with the Korean People.
					 The statement fully supported and warmly hailed the successful nuclear test conducted by the DPRK to defend its sovereignty at a crucial time when the U.S. and its followers became extreme in their hostile moves against the DPRK.
					
					 The independence of a country and nation can be protected by its own efforts in the present world, the statement said, adding:
					
					 The recent nuclear test was the legitimate exercise of sovereignty by the DPRK as part of its self-defensive measures to cope with the escalating moves of the enemies to stifle it.
					
					 It urged the U.S. to properly see the determination and strength of the service personnel and people of the DPRK all out in the action against the U.S. and stop its rash actions.
					
					 Progressive people and organizations of Ecuador express firm solidarity with the struggle of the Korean people, guardian of justice, advancing under the uplifted banner of Songun, single-mindedly united around the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, it stressed.

articles.title: Austrian Organization Protests against S. Korean Authorities' Tyrannical Actions against Pro-Reunification Champions
articles.content:
Austrian Organization Protests against S. Korean Authorities' Tyrannical Actions against Pro-Reunification Champions
						
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The Left Bloc of the Austrian Trade Union Federation sent a letter to the south Korean puppet embassy in Vienna on Feb. 11 in protest against the south Korean authorities' suppression of pro-reunification patriots.
					 The letter branded the decision made by a court against Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, and its secretary general on charges of violation of the fascist "Security Law" as an evil action taken against all people struggling for the peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					 It demanded the south Korean authorities immediately set free the vice-chairman and all those imprisoned for their struggle for country's reunification and abolish the SL at once.

articles.title: Polish Organization Supports Measure Taken by DPRK for Bolstering Its Defence Capability
articles.content:
Polish Organization Supports Measure Taken by DPRK for Bolstering Its Defence Capability 
						
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association issued a statement on Feb. 14 in support of the DPRK's third underground nuclear test.
					 The statement fully supported the nuclear test conducted by the DPRK as a step to bolster its defence capability.
					
					 History taught the Korean people a lesson that there is no future for the country and nation when they lack powerful and efficient defence capability, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Since its foundation, the DPRK has resolutely rejected big powers' all forms of interference in its affairs.
					
					 There is no reason for the DPRK to be censured as it strives hard to defend its dignity and independence.
					
					 The U.S. has shunned any contact with the DPRK in a bid to realize its sinister ambition.
					
					 Peace and stability are hard to be achieved on the Korean Peninsula unless the U.S. forces withdraw from south Korea.
					
					 The statement urged the U.S. to roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: Russian Organization Hails DPRK's Third Underground Nuclear Test
articles.content:
Russian Organization Hails DPRK's Third Underground Nuclear Test
						
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK made public a statement on Feb. 13 to hail the DPRK's successful third underground nuclear test.
					 The statement welcomed the essential step taken by the DPRK, a demonstration of its might.
					
					 A nuclear deterrent in the present world serves as the only means for deterring the U.S. from forcing the DPRK to accept its will, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The recent nuclear test of the DPRK is welcomed by progressives in Russia.
					
					 The DPRK will smash the U.S. intensified moves to stifle it and win a victory. It is because justice is in the side of the DPRK.
					
					 The statement was posted on the website of the group together with a poster introducing the military capability of the DPRK.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo and Fine Art Exhibition Opens in China
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo and Fine Art Exhibition Opens in China
						
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- A Korean book, photo and fine art exhibition was opened with due ceremony in Beijing on Feb. 16, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed in the venue of the exhibition were photos of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un on their leadership feats.
					
					 Also displayed there were works of the peerlessly great men, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and fine art works associated with talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Chinese officials concerned, a staff member of the DPRK embassy in Beijing and members of the delegation of the Korean Overseas Exhibition General Bureau.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the photos of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The exhibition continues till Feb. 26.

articles.title: Prosiguen mitines en saludo a tercera prueba nuclear subterranean
articles.content:
Prosiguen mitines en saludo a tercera prueba nuclear subterranea
						
Pyongyang, 19 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar este martes tambien los mitines de uniformados y civiles en las provincias de Phyong-an del Sur, de Hwanghae del Sur, de Ryanggang y de la ciudad de Nampho para felicitar el exito de la tercera prueba nuclear subterranea.
					Tomaron parte en las ocasiones los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido y el poder y entidades de masas, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios, trabajadores, profesores, empleados y estudiantes de las fabricas, empresas, granjas cooperativas, institutos superiores y escuelas especializadas de las respectivas provincias.
					
					Los oradores puntualizaron que la tercera prueba nuclear, que sacudio el mundo, deviene acontecimiento historico que manifesto el temperamento de Corea de cumplir todo lo que decide en cualesquier vientos y mareas.
					
					Senalaron que el exito de la prueba nuclear ha demostrado claramente la voluntad de la Corea del Songun para defender su soberania y es resultado brillante de la audacia y coraje sin par y la sabia direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Recalcaron que ni la campana de "sancion" ni la supremacia militar de los enemigos arrogantes podran frenar ni un comino la potencia del monte Paektu.
					
					Anadieron que ya paso para siempre la epoca en que los enemigos amenazaban a Corea con bombas atomicas.
					
					Enviaron calidas felicitaciones a los cientificos, tecnicos, trabajadores y funcionarios quienes manifestaron la dignidad independiente y el invencible impetu de la potencia del monte Paektu al realizar exitosamente la prueba nuclear.
					
					Aseveraron que a traves del presente acontecimiento, el ejercito y pueblo coreanos tomaron la firme conviccion de que esta asegurada la victoria final cuando marchen por el camino de la independencia, el Songun y el socialismo siguiendo al gran partido.

articles.title: Embajador cubano ofrece banquete por 16 de febrero
articles.content:
Embajador cubano ofrece banquete por 16 de febrero
						
Pyongyang, 19 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el embajador de la Republica de Cuba en Corea, German Hermin Ferras Alvarez, ofrecio el dia 19 un banquete en su sede diplomatica.
					Fueron invitados a la recepcion el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Yong Il, el canciller Pak Ui Chun y otros funcionarios coreanos.
					
					El representante diplomatico dijo en su discurso de la ocasion que la vida revolucionaria del Dirigente Kim Jong Il fue la imperecedera dedicada al incremento del poderio de Corea, la construccion del socialismo y al mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo.
					
					Destaco que Cuba estara siempre al lado del hermano pueblo coreano que lucha por la soberania, la construccion socialista y la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					En nombre del partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de Cuba, deseo de todo corazon al Mariscal Kim Jong Un buena salud y mayores exitos en sus tareas para la felicidad y la prosperidad del pueblo coreano.
					
					Kim Yong Il senalo en su discurso que los companeros cubanos celebran con solemnidad cada ano el Dia de la Estrella Luz, lo cual es un testimonio de la veneracion al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Continuo que la inmortal vida y hazanas revolucionarias del Dirigente brillan gracias al Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Afirmo que en el futuro tambien, Corea fortalecera sin cesar la amistad combativa y los lazos de cooperacion con Cuba y enviara irrestricto apoyol y solidaridad a la justa lucha del pueblo caribeno.

articles.title: Sobrepasan 270 mil visitantes al Festival de Kimjongilias
articles.content:
Sobrepasan 270 mil visitantes al Festival de Kimjongilias 
						
Pyongyang, 19 de febrero (ACNC) -- La sede del 17o Festival de Kimjongilias, inaugurado el dia 14 en homenaje al dia de natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, fue visitada por mas de 270 mil oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, trabajadores de diversos estratos, jovenes y ninos escolares, compatriotas en ultramar y huespedes extranjeros.
					Acaparan la atencion de los visitantes los mostradores adornados de modo original por el Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, la unidad del EPC a la que pertenece Kim Song Dok, etc.
					
					Los otros del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, el Secretariado del Consejo de Ministros, los Ministerios de Industria Ligera, Salud Publica y Agricultura y otras muchas unidades causaron la evocacion al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					El estante del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria decorado con cientos de kimjongilias y las mismas flores, enviadas por el Presidium del Comite Central de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon) y los coreanos residentes en varios paises y regiones, dejan conocer el gran respeto a ese Gran Hombre.
					
					Los visitantes presenciaron las kimjongilias exhibidas por las representaciones diplomaticas y de organizaciones internacionales en la RPDC, las entidades de amistad y personalidades extranjeras.

articles.title: Transcurre Exposicion Central de Bellas Artes por el 16 de febrero
articles.content:
Transcurre Exposicion Central de Bellas Artes por el 16 de febrero
						
Pyongyang, 19 de febrero (ACNC) -- Se efectua desde el dia 14 en el Museo de Bellas Artes de Corea, situado en la parte central de esta capital, la Exposicion Central de Bellas Artes dedicada al Dia de la Estrella Luz (16 de febrero-cumpleanos del Dirigente Kim Jong Il).
					Fueron exhibidas en la ocasion 70 obras como pinturas al estilo coreano, al oleo y las acrilicas, presentadas por la Casa de Creacion Mansudae, la Casa Central de Creacion de Bellas Artes, la Universidad de Bellas Artes de Pyongyang y otras unidades.
					
					Las pinturas al oleo "Diciendo que vino para verse con sus soldados", "Visitando el puesto encubierto de nieve" y otras demuestran el gran amor del Dirigente Kim Jong Il por los uniformados del Ejercito Popular.
					
					En particular, "Estacion en que se madura el caqui" refleja bien la unidad entre el Comandante Supremo y las militares de una compania femenina, conocida por la abundancia de caqui.
					
					Las pinturas al estilo coreano "El General y los obreros de Songgang" y "El gran Dirigente Kim Jong Il en la galeria de fondo de una mina carbonifera" transmiten que el presto profunda atencion al desarrollo de la industria carbonifera poniendo a los obreros en la delantera de creacion de gran auge revolucionario.
					
					Ademas, "Junto con los desarrolladores de la maquinaria Ryonha" deja conocer que el condujo sabiamente la rama de industria mecanica a que se produzca un gran viraje a base de la economia nacional autarquica.
					
					La obra al oleo "Presentando el gran proyecto de transformacion de naturaleza" y la acrilica "Madrugada de Phanmunjom" hacen recordar los ingentes esfuerzos del Dirigente por acondicionar mejor la patria socialista dejada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y heredarla a las nuevas generaciones y por cumplir la causa de reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Saltan a la vista tambien los afiches "El gran Dirigente, camarada Kim Jong Il, vive siempre en nosotros" y "!Construyamos por estilo nuestro una gran potencia prospera!" demuestran la decision del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea de enaltecer eternamente al Dirigente y de luchar por la victoria de la causa de construccion de una potencia prospera socialista bajo la guia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					La galeria terminara el dia 28.
